welcome_message_title: Welcome to Santa Cruz del Quiche
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santa Cruz del Quiche! This charming city is known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful destination has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quiche Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quiche Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Huehuetenango Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Huehuetenango Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
